original_text:
For thus says the One who is high and lifted up,
    who inhabits eternity, whose name is Holy:
“I dwell in the high and holy place,
    and also with him who is of a contrite and lowly spirit,
to revive the spirit of the lowly,
    and to revive the heart of the contrite.
korean_text: 지극히 존귀하며 영원히 거하시며 거룩하다 이름하는 이가 이와 같이 말씀하시되 내가 높고 거룩한 곳에 있으며 또한 통회하고 마음이 겸손한 자와 함께 있나니 이는 겸손한 자의 영을 소생시키며 통회하는 자의 마음을 소생시키려 함이라

sentences.original_text: who is high and lifted up
I dwell in the high and holy place
and also with him who is of a contrite and lowly spirit
sentences.korean_translation: 또한 심령이 통회하고 겸손한 자와 함께 있으니

sentences.original_text: to revive the spirit of the lowly
and to revive the heart of the contrite
